column1: The number of people in China killed by the novel coronavirus rose to at least 212, and the World Health Organization called the outbreak a global health emergency, signs that the spread of the sometimes deadly pathogen shows no signs of abating.

The number of people in China killed by the novel coronavirus rose to at least 212, and the World Health Organization called the outbreak a global health emergency, signs that the spread of the sometimes deadly pathogen shows no signs of abating. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-01-30/china-deaths-rise-to-212-who-declares-emergency-virus-update?srnd=premium-europe …

They finally named the deadly coronavirus sweeping through China: It's Covid-19 https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-02-11/new-name-for-disease-caused-by-virus-outbreak-covid-19 … via @business
